__e: You are not going Dark and you are not losing me.
Do that and you will hurl this planet back into the dark ages, and for what?
I'm the one who has seen I talk to the darkness... And I've no fear anymore.
Now I am chasing after the Dark One, hoping he can help me find the Wicked Witch of the West.
"This is a dark night for our country.
Now, it's all very well to say that the Dark Ages which followed the fall of Rome weren't their fault.
You can use the same dark power which killed my sister.
The Dark One can't die, not like that.
Just because I'm the Dark One doesn't mean we can't still be together.
Speaking of your dark one-ness, don't you think it's time you tell me the truth of what happened?
You figured out how to take the darkness out of me once.
The anger has gone... and I can see I spent my life living in a haze of a broken heart.
Then it's time to destroy the darkness once and for all.
